definition: to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: To shorten the time, the rapid thermal burn cooking pot is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 若想缩短时间，断热烹调的焖烧锅值得推荐。

sentences.english: Close the lid and turn the knob to pork cooking cycle to stew about 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 盖上盖子，调至肉类档位焖煮大约15分钟。

sentences.english: It is a stew of snake meat and cat meat.
sentences.chinese: 是用蛇肉和猫肉焖制而成的。

sentences.english: The engine is equipped with one turbocharger per cylinder bank.
sentences.chinese: 引擎被装备每气缸焖火一个涡轮增压器。

sentences.english: Stew the chicken for 30 minutes. Remove and brush it with malt sugar.
sentences.chinese: 焖约三十分钟后盛起，于鸡身涂麦芽糖。

sentences.english: Therefore braise-oven technology of roast duck is considered to be a non-material cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 因此，焖炉烤鸭工艺是急需保护的非物质文化遗产。

sentences.english: The Vietnamese-style braised pork is so delicious because it is cooked until it is very tender.
sentences.chinese: 越式焖烧肉能如此美味是因为肉会被烹调至非常柔软。

sentences.english: My second favourite dish is potato braised chicken wings.
sentences.chinese: 我第二道喜欢的菜肴是土豆焖鸡翅。

sentences.english: The restaurant features a special dishes of Menlu roasted duck, as well as Shandong, Hunan, and Guangdong dishes.
sentences.chinese: 店内以焖炉烤鸭为特色菜，并以鲁湘粤菜系为辅。

sentences.english: The pot roast was broiled for three hours.
sentences.chinese: 那锅焖烧牛肉煮了三个小时。

sentences.english: Braised Pork Chop with White Beans, Stewed Mutton, Kidney in Red Wine, etc.
sentences.chinese: 我们还有洋葱铁扒猪排，白豆焖猪排，炖。

sentences.english: Shape the glutinous rice into balls and serve with ripe mango cubes.
sentences.chinese: 糯米焖好后就可以撮成小团，配上芒果丁即可。

sentences.english: Add water and cook for 10 minutes, covered. Add the chopped up parsley and serve.
sentences.chinese: 注入清水加盖焖约10分钟，拌入芫荽叶即成。

sentences.english: Braised lion's head with bamboo shoots.
Braised Pork Chop with White Beans, Stewed Mutton, Kidney in Red Wine, and many other dishes.
sentences.chinese: 白豆焖猪排，炖羊肉，红酒烩腰花等其他许多菜。

sentences.english: My method of cooking green beans is to steam them first and then simmer in tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 我烹调四季豆的方法是先煮，然后再加番茄酱焖。

definition: to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
to cook slowly over a low flame/pot/saucepan
(of food etc) soft/pulpy/(Tw) (of a person) lacking drive/shiftless/lazy
